statements: DELETE FROM support_reports WHERE agent_id = '1111e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND ticket_date > '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM support_ticket_trends WHERE id = 1 AND status = 'closed';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE agent_id = 15 AND rating <= 3;
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 101 AND ticket_status = 'Closed';
DELETE FROM agent_performance WHERE total_tickets_handled > 500 AND agent_rating < 4.5;
